content.rendered:
Tuesday, March 18th, 2025

                                                        Today is a “B” Day 

  • Tomorrow is Spring Spirit Day- Everyone in Red Spring wear red; Everyone in Excelsior wear blue; Everyone in Columbian wear orange; Everyone in Hathorn wear yellow. If you are associated with multiple springs wear tie-dye 

 

  • There will be a student council meeting in Mrs. Kerls room on Wednesday March 19th. 

 

  • French Club will meet on Wednesday after school in room E142. All students are welcome, even if you don’t take French. 

 

  • Be a Hero to our Heroes Fundraiser from March 10th through March 21st. The student council will be holding a fundraiser asking for basic supplies and goods from students of all grades. In the fundraiser “Be a hero to our heroes” although its entirely optional, we’re asking you to donate things like food, clothing, personal care items and more. If you want some ideas, you can look around the halls for flyers bolded with red, white and blue. In addition, one flex per grade will be awarded with a treat for donating the most items out of their peers. So, let’s show our respect for both people in battle and returning veterans. Let’s get donating Maple! 

 

  • Attention Pop Culture Icon Club – we will be combining with Voice Club, on Wednesday, March 19, after school, in the Chorus room. You must report to the auditorium at dismissal. PLEASE let Ms. Schnorr know if you need a late bus pass. 

 

Today’s lunch is Cheesy Bread sticks with marinara sauce. Seasoned green beans and tomato, cucumber mozz salad

Check out the Maple Avenue Club Calendar for club meetings and room information! 
As always, BE SAFE, BE RESPECTFUL, BE RESPONSIBLE, BE KIND!
